item.description:
A VERNAL URBAN MYSTERY TOUR
TC: Gary (mosaictrip5@averagebear.us (preferred) or
781.355.2099 (evenings)
EVENT: Celebrate the start of Spring and join us
on another fun urban walking adventure,
accessible by public transit. Be prepared for up
to two miles of walking outdoors, and dress for
the possible weather extremes. Bad weather will
modify, not cancel. Please have a T pass, a
charged up Charlie Card or Ticket, or exact
change. We will wind up with a snack/small meal.
RSVP: By Thursday prior to Gary at the email addr or ph # listed above.
MEET: 11:30 AM. Please RSVP prior to Friday
evening to get the location and directions, email strongly preferred.
COST: T fare, lunch/snack money, plus $5 non-members
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to the Trip's Coordinator, Gary to make the Arrangements

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A VERNAL URBAN MYSTERY TOUR
